job_title: Driver (рж▓рж╛ржЗржЯ/ржорж┐ржбрж┐рзЯрж╛ржо ржнрзЗрж╣рж┐ржХрж▓ ржбрзНрж░рж╛ржЗржнрж╛рж░) -SANS International Co.-рж╕рзМржжрж┐ ржЖрж░ржм
job_description:
Responsibilities: The SANS International Company in Saudi Arabia is currently hiring for the position of Driver - Light/Medium Vehicle . Benefits: Salary: 1500-2000 Riyal + Overtime Accommodation: Provided by the company; Food: Own Working Hours: 8 hours per day, 6 days a week; (1 day off) Other Benefits: Iqama and transportation provided by the company Overtime: As per Saudi labor law Job Responsibilities: Drive the vehicle safely following the designated route, traffic laws, and company safety policies. Safely and timely transport passengers, staff, or goods to the destination. Maintain the vehicle's routine maintenance (oil, water, tire pressure, brakes, light inspection). Keep the vehicle clean and well-maintained and report any damage/issues immediately. Update and carry necessary documents (license, registration, insurance) correctly. ЁЯУМ Qualifications: (Please read carefully before applying for the job) ======================================== Age: 21 - 40 years. Candidates outside this age range will not be called for an interview. Educational Qualification: SSC or equivalent. A valid driving license is mandatory. Proficiency in speaking and writing in English clearly and fluently is necessary. Relevant work experience of 2-3 years in the field is required. ЁЯУЖ Pre-selection Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Validity: 2 (two) years - renewable. Passport: All candidates must bring both new and old passports to the interview. The passport must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Those without a passport should not apply. Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining the visa.
